== Intrepid Ibex Release Party Malta ==

==== Date and time ====
Friday 31st October 2008 4.30pm till 7.30pm<<BR>>

==== Place ====
Aroma Restaurant, Valletta<<BR>>
{{https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MaltaTeam?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=placeonmap.png}}

==== Organisors ====
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MaltaTeam|MalteseTeam]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxmalta.tk|LinuxMalta.tk]]</nowiki><<BR>>
<<BR>>
invited: <nowiki>[[http://www.linux.org.mt|Malta Linux User Group]]</nowiki><<BR>>

==== Aim ====
* To hang out with other Ubuntu users, meet new faces and getting to know each other. 
* Celebrate new Intrepid Ibex 8.10

==== What will be happening ====
* A short meeting
* Dinner
* (installfest postponed, will be ran with MLUG; 15th November 10:00am)

==== Notes ====
* This will basically be a dinner in order to get to know each other.
* If you've got a laptop, you may bring it with you.
* If you have got suggestions for the team, please do bring them along with you.
